title: International Finance Forum Kickstarts 2022 Spring Meetings, Calls for Cooperation amid Global Challenges - Yahoo Finance
content: International Finance Forum Kickstarts 2022 Spring Meetings, Calls for Cooperation amid Global Challenges  Yahoo Finance
description: International Finance Forum (IFF) has kickstarted its 2022 spring meetings on April 27 in Beijing with the theme of "New Global Landscape: Challenges and Responses".
